What technologies do you specialize in?

I specialize in Vue.js and Nuxt.js with 4 years of experience building SaaS platforms and scalable web applications. My expertise includes TypeScript, Vue Router, Pinia, server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and API-driven architectures. I've integrated 30+ REST APIs and designed CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.
What types of projects have you worked on?

I've developed and maintained multiple SaaS platforms including appointment management systems, inventory solutions, payment integrations, auto-generated websites, and AI-powered features. How do you ensure code quality?

I follow best practices including TypeScript for type safety, comprehensive code reviews, proactive debugging, and clean architecture principles. In my recent role, I migrated a codebase to TypeScript which reduced production errors by 30%, and performed 20+ code reviews to maintain high standards across the team.
How do you collaborate with teams?

I thrive in collaborative environments, working closely with backend teams to design API contracts, participating in code reviews, and contributing to system architecture decisions. I've designed 10+ API contracts following DDD principles and actively engage in cross-functional collaboration.

I have extensive experience with REST APIs, having integrated over 30 endpoints with robust handling of authentication, errors, and loading states. I collaborate with backend teams from the design phase to ensure contracts are well-defined and follow best practices.
